rescuecore2.standard.view
Class StandardEntityViewLayer<T extends StandardEntity>

java.lang.Object
  rescuecore2.view.AbstractViewLayer
      rescuecore2.standard.view.StandardViewLayer
          rescuecore2.standard.view.StandardEntityViewLayer<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The subclass of StandardEntity that this layer knows how to render.
All Implemented Interfaces:
ViewLayer
Direct Known Subclasses:
AreaLayer, AreaNeighboursLayer, BuildingIconLayer, HumanLayer, PositionHistoryLayer, RoadBlockageLayer
public abstract class StandardEntityViewLayer<T extends StandardEntity>
extends StandardViewLayer

An abstract base class for StandardWorldModel view layers that render standard entities.

Method Detail

view

public java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D view(java.lang.Object... objects)
Description copied from interface: ViewLayer
Set the list of objects this layer should view. The layer should record the objects it understands and draw them when ViewLayer.render(Graphics2D, ScreenTransform, int, int) is called.

Specified by:
view in interface ViewLayer
Overrides:
view in class StandardViewLayer
Parameters:
objects - The objects to view.
Returns:
A Rectangle2D with the bounds of the area this layer wants to draw. This may be null if this layer has nothing to draw.

render

public java.util.Collection<RenderedObject> render(java.awt.Graphics2D g,
                                                   ScreenTransform transform,
                                                   int width,
                                                   int height)
Description copied from interface: ViewLayer
Render this layer and return a collection of RenderedObjects.

Parameters:
g - The graphics to render to.
transform - The ScreenTransform that will convert world coordinates to screen coordinates.
width - The width of the screen in pixels.
height - The height of the screen in pixels.
Returns:
A set of RenderedObjects representing the things that were actually rendered.

render

public abstract java.awt.Shape render(T entity,
                                      java.awt.Graphics2D graphics,
                                      ScreenTransform transform)
Render an entity and return the shape. This shape is used for resolving mouse-clicks so should represent a hit-box for the entity.

Parameters:
entity - The entity to render.
graphics - The graphics to render on.
transform - A helpful coordinate transformer.
Returns:
A Shape that represents the hit-box of the rendered entity.
